cast.name: 勒兹万·瓦西莱斯库 Răzvan Vasilescu

introduction: The story of a man on the threshold of old age, a young woman arrived by chance an unfortunate prostitute in Italy and a teenager, try life and fail to communicate, supported in their dialogue with the legend "Master Manole".Reality and fiction are building a special state in which past, present and future simultaneously invade their existence. In a place of waiting, on the shore of a lake still undefiled people, three intersecting his memories of this grotesque tension.Eroticism and the poetics of this film suggests stressful and dangerous lack of opportunity of three generations. Only light can initiate their soul and ascension church.
